urls.title: Bonfires are not an excuse to burn household rubbish
urls.description: Only clean, non-commercial waste should be burned like paper, untreated wood and cardboard.

text:
This #BonfireNight make sure the waste you're burning is clean & safe 🔥

Certain types of material can cause pollution & damage people’s health.

Make sure you know where the material has come from and only burn clean, non-commercial waste. 

Read more👇 https://t.co/wOqmSAjew0 https://t.co/HtJOm7XuOq
